content.text:
# Crazy (Miki Howard song)

"Crazy" is a song by American R&B/soul singer Miki Howard. Released in 1988, as the third single from Love Confessions. "Crazy" peaked to #38 on Billboard's Hot R&B Singles chart.[ Top 100 Music Hits, Top 100 Music Charts, Top 100 Songs & The Hot 100 | Billboard.com] The song was written and produced by Marc Gordon and Gerald Levert, of R&B group LeVert.
